titles.title: CVV Act
Codification of Verified Values Act
CVV Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require that online contributions to a political organization require a credit verification value.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Codification of Verified Values Act or the CVV Act
This bill requires a contributor to political organizations who uses a credit card to make online contributions to such organizations to disclose the credit verification value of such credit card at the time a contribution is made. A credit verification value is a series of numbers on a credit card (usually on the back of the card) that provides additional security for a transaction by credit card.
